body:
Aye some of you will know me as pizza334/Taco334/OreoDough/PizzaThePanda or my current name IAmNotRaging. My names are very creative no need to say. Anyway little bit about me for them people new to the forums.

I'm 13 Living in South East England
I love Running and a multitude of other sports.
I first got staff January 2014 
I first joined the server march the 6th 2013
I run/Founder of the team Apollo
My favorite holiday destination was Vietnam
My favorite celebrity would have to be Usain Bolt (Fan Boy)
I have a love for Weetabix (breakfast cereal)

Feel free to hop on teamspeak sometime if you guys ever wanna chat or add my skype (Claw334) Yes i know i shouldn't be leaving my skype lying about , deal with it. <3

Anyway , ask away. <3
